title: Frequency Counter
code:
§begin count_frequency
  items ← ["red", "blue", "red", "green", "blue", "red"]
  counts ← §create_map
  §iterate color §in items
    §if §exists counts[color]
      counts[color] ← counts[color] ⊕ 1
    §else
      counts[color] ← 1
    §end_if
  §end_iterate
  §transmit counts["red"]
  §transmit counts["blue"]
  §transmit counts["green"]
§end
solution_description: counts frequency of each item in an array using a dictionary
hints: Each item increments its count in the dictionary
red appears 3 times, blue 2 times, green 1 time
This is a classic frequency counter pattern
